text:
Breaking News Translate Home » News » Reno to Lai Mohammed: You’re a liar for saying killing of Christians in Nigeria a fallacy Reno to Lai Mohammed: You’re a liar for saying killing of Christians in Nigeria a fallacy On 1:17 pm In News by Tony Comments 
Reno Omokri has said that the Minister of Information and Culture, Lai Mohammed is a liar for saying that the killing of Christians in Nigeria is a fallacy. Tony
